skills.desc:
Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Has a 30% chance of placing a 50% [Decrease ATK] debuff for 2 turns if the target's Turn Meter is more than or exactly 50% full.

Has a 30% chance of placing a 30% [Decrease SPD] debuff for 2 turns if the target's Turn Meter is less than 50% full.
skills.name: Cleaving Axe
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 6 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%

skills.desc: Attacks 2 times at random. Has an 80% chance of placing a [Stun] debuff if the target's Turn Meter is above or equal 75%.
skills.name: Capital Punishment
